short_summary: The department is seeking service the training of energy related vocational training
description: ISO 50001 Energy Management System Training Webinar
full_summary:
=====================================

### ISO 50001 Energy Management System Training Webinar

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites proposals from bidders to develop and deliver webinars focused on training on the ISO 50001 Energy Management Systems standard. The objective is to promote (1) the 50001 Ready Navigator and (2) the 50001 Ready Canada Recognition program.

#### Solicitation Information
-----------------------------

* **Notice Number**: NRCan-5000077660
* **Publication Date**: March 19, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 16, 2024, at 14:00:00

#### Important Details
-------------------

* **Contract Period**: June 3, 2024, to May 30, 2025
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Traditional
* **Selection Criteria**: The highest combined rating of technical merit and price

#### Required Documents
----------------------

* [RFC (Request for Proposal)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34374/nrcan-5000077660---rfp.pdf)
* [Amendment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34374/nrcan-5000077660-amendment.pdf)
* [Questions and Answers - Part 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34374/questions-answers-nrcan-5000077660_1.pdf)
* [Questions and Answers - Part 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34374/questions-answers-nrcan-5000077660_2.pdf)

#### Contact Information
----------------------

* **Name**: Anik Samson
* **Email**: anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (613) 408-3462

### Trade Agreements
-------------------

This contract may be covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Geographical Scope
---------------------

This tender is limited to Canada.

----------
